body.p: Desirous of obtaining a commission in the Kentucky Volunteers, I have the honor of submitting the following statement of services rendered -- I have served seven years in the Corps of Engineers, Commanded by Major Barnard, Lieuts Donelson and Duane -- Served on the Utah Expedition, Oregon and Washington Territory and in the Army of the Potomac --
I respectfully submit the above Statement of my services, with the Enclosed recommendations, hoping they may be favorably considered --

I have the honor to be sir,
very respectfully
Your most obdt. Servant
Thos. H. Leas.

P.S.
I sent application with recommendations from Brig. Gen Gilmore, sometime since --
Reference, David A. Sayre Lexington Ky.
